messages.message: I think this may be caused by not having the pyenv snippet in bashrc. I for one do not need to do all these steps in new sandboxes.

fwiw this is why I set the `PYENV_ROOT` environment variable, along with including `/usr/local/pyenv/shims` and `/usr/local/pyenv/bin` in `PATH`, on the ibdev template -- that allows users to have full control over their `.zshrc`/`.bashrc`/etc (which does have its downsides compared to managing those files in the template, just depends on what results in less of a headache :lolcry: )
Hmm, I don’t think I did anything differently from that template (I used it as a starting point) but I’ll double check that.
